name: Archetype - The Pupil - Toro
additionalNotes: Archetype launched in 2016 with the branding inspired by the writings of Carl Jung and Joseph Campbell, specifically about the character archetypes that define people. The latest offerings are Pupil and Master. Both cigars are made at Joya de Nicaragua. The Master is a Nicaraguan puro, while Pupil uses an Ecuadorian Connecticut wrapper over Nicaraguan fillers. Outside of that, the wrapper looks good with no discoloration or water spots. I don’t get a ton of aroma from the Pupil’s wrapper, and what it does offer smells a bit like a pretzel with some barnyard flavors.
